title: Computer crashes from patching
body: recently I deleted my game because I thought it would fix another problem I was having but it was something that many players was experiencing with the loop that would say something like download has failed and will revert the client to an older version or something like that but when that was fixed by Riot I re downloaded the client it updated just fine but when it had to actually had to download the game and the patches via the client, it will get stalled randomly sometimes before it hits 10% and sometimes later that farthest I have been able to reach was 41%, but at some point it will just freeze the download because my computer crashes and when I mean crash I mean like full on gray desktop literally cant do anything except hard shut down crash, I can download anything else perfectly and play any other game just fine but It only happens with league, iv tried fixes for download stalling like starting with admin in every which way iv flushed my DNS and just downloading a new installer and a new client and it seems like nothing is helping, Iv looked on forums and it seems I am literally the only person that has actually had their league client completely crash their computer from just downloading patches (I also downloaded an older client from a source and still the same thing has happened) this issue just started after the 8/12/2017 patch or maybe it was a day before that but I cant get anything to work is there any logical reason why this is happening???

You are not alone, exactly the same thing is happending to me. And I've only had my pc like a month and a half. I just bought it.

Hey DragonT4 I found a solution to the problem I don't know what was actually causing the problem but if you do  system reset by going to settings -> update and security -> recovery -> and then under reset this pc click get started and click the option of how you want to reset your pc it completely fixed my problem although now I have to download all my other programs again I really just wanted to fix this issue
Im currently working with the tech support as the issue is developing/deepining ill let you know if a solutin to the problem comes around

If your entire PC is crashing, presumably due to the client update if that's the only time it happens, there might be something internally going wrong with your pc.  I want to make sure this get's fully addressed and troubleshot, so go ahead and hit up our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to look over some of your League Logs to see what's going on.
